Name: LSD
About the game: LSD (Look So Delicious) is the new match 3 game with beautiful juicy anime graphics! Classic light casual gameplay in the best traditions of the genre. It's easy to learn. Line up and win! Explore casual match3 in company with cute anime girls! Game features Cute graphics Match3 Classic casual gameplay Simple and fun! Achievements! Selective difficulty level In our game you will need to help overcome a sweet anime girl's path to the stars. Collect 3 stars in each level to achieve mastery in the match3 game! It's easy to start and hard to stop.
